ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The material is terrific and challenging. Class discussions could be more focused to help students better understand the material.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: give me exposure to the basis of my field

Marx, Durkheim and Weber are clearly essential material for any Sociologist. It might have been nice to have some practical examples of contemporary papers written using the ideas of these thinkers, or to spend more time reflecting on how these ideas might inform our research. I wish as well that this course was part of a two course series with the second part being 20th century Sociological theory.
